subject: Accidents and Safety
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: With safer racecars and equipment, Nascar has come far in protecting its drivers during wrecks. And yet the racetracks where they compete have not done the same.
snippet: With safer racecars and equipment, Nascar has come far in protecting its drivers during wrecks. And yet the racetracks where they compete have not done the same.
